Nigerian lawmakers pass 2024 budget after Tinubu seeks extra fundsNigerian lawmakers approved a 28.77 trillion naira ($34 billion) budget for 2024 on Saturday, accepting a funding increase which the government had sought due to higher revenue forecasts and a weaker currency. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 16:34:23 GMT HQDX3VZG5RIIPKDYEVVCC3BZHM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerian-lawmakers-pass-2024-budget-after-tinubu-seeks-extra-funds-2023-12-30/Camillus Eboh世界非洲
ASEAN foreign ministers express concern over South China Sea tensionsForeign ministers of Southeast Asia's regional bloc ASEAN on Saturday expressed their concern over growing tensions in the South China Sea which they said could threaten regional peace and urged for peaceful dialogue among parties. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 16:34:15 GMT 4E7VU5YIM5KMJDB5GLJWA2FTDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asean-foreign-ministers-express-concern-over-south-china-sea-tensions-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Georgian billionaire ex-PM Ivanishvili returns to politics before electionFormer Georgian prime minister Bidzina Ivanishvili, a billionaire widely held to wield huge political influence, said on Saturday he was returning to frontline politics after two years, ahead of parliamentary elections in 2024. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 15:01:32 GMT HUFVF3XLN5MY7MPM267IFI3IKU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/georgian-billionaire-ex-pm-ivanishvili-returns-politics-before-election-2023-12-30/Felix Light世界欧洲
Serbian opposition demands annulment of Dec. 17 voteThousands gathered in a square in in central Belgrade on Saturday in the biggest protest yet over parliamentary and municipal elections on Dec. 17, results of which the demonstrators want anulled. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:50:40 GMT POM63OW2XJPJBP7MFFE7ASBU2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/serbian-opposition-demands-annulment-dec-17-vote-2023-12-30/Ivana Sekularac世界欧洲
Air strikes hit Iran-backed militia facilities, truck convoy in SyriaUnidentified jets hit buildings and trucks being used by Iran-aligned militia groups in the Syrian town of Albukamal along a strategic border crossing with Iraq late on Friday, Iraqi security and border officials told Reuters. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:46:03 GMT URHMEE2XBVNMVMWW76KTLETLQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/air-strikes-hit-iran-backed-militia-facilities-truck-convoy-syria-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中东
Tunisia extends state of emergency by one month till Jan. 30, 2024Tunisia extended a longrunning state of emergency by one month until Jan. 30, 2024, the state news agency reported on Saturday citing the official gazette. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:44:15 GMT DN7KU2ZSPJMK5HQOPDCQ65TN4I https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/tunisia-extends-state-emergency-by-one-month-till-jan-30-2024-state-news-agency-2023-12-30/Reuters世界非洲
Over 1,000 Burundian soldiers covertly deploy in eastern Congo, internal UN report saysOver 1,000 Burundian troops have been covertly deployed in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo since October, wearing the uniform of Congolese troops and working alongside them in the fight against M23 rebels, an unpublished U.N. report seen by Reuters showed. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:43:04 GMT SPJOMXDJ25KW5M2DD5CB6TA3YQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/over-1000-burundian-soldiers-covertly-deploy-eastern-congo-internal-un-report-2023-12-30/Sonia Rolley世界非洲
Ukraine death toll after massive Russian air attack rises to 39Russia launched 158 missiles and drones on cities and towns across Ukraine on Friday in what Ukrainian officials described as the worst aerial bombardment since the start of the war in February 2022. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:18:56 GMT 7DO2ZNZKGFO4JCCZPRRH7KV5FA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-death-toll-after-massive- Russian-air-attack-rises-39-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Madrid charity dog walk draws hundreds against animal abandonmentHundreds of canines and their owners took to the streets of Madrid on Saturday for the city's traditional Sanperrestre walk to raise awareness about animal abandonment. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:04:47 GMT QEHJIGC5N5MMHHV3UCRO6NGMX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/madrid-charity-dog-walk-draws-hundreds-against-animal-abandonment-2023-12-30/Elena Rodriguez世界欧洲
Chinese military purge exposes weakness, could widenThe purges are a setback for Xi Jinping, who has pumped billions into the military. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:02:54 GMT SDCN54JPNFJFPNGHAIQJNMFYHM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/sweeping-chinese-military-purge-exposes-weakness-could-widen-2023-12-30/Yew Lun Tian, Laurie Chen世界中国
Albania's former PM placed under house arrest in corruption probeA court in Albania on Saturday ordered that former president and prime minister Sali Berisha be placed under house arrest following corruption charges relating to his time in office. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 13:57:22 GMT SGS4Q3MY5BNV5D26DQWYF2VHIE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/albanias-former-pm-placed-under-house-arrest-corruption-probe-2023-12-30/Reuters世界欧洲
